column1: Nevada's Latino community made their voices heard in this election and ensured that we kept Nevada blue.   In Nevada our diversity is our strength.  https://t.co/y6UmGmyFxz
I'm extraordinarily proud that our state continues to make history by expanding our majority-women state legislature!   I look forward to other states following our example.  https://t.co/EE0y5m9KJH
Wishing a happy birthday to our next president @JoeBiden! https://t.co/7eZDamNU3m
Today I’m thinking of my dad and veterans all across our country.   Thank you to all of our veterans for their service today and every day. https://t.co/eQia9B0RPl
Congratulations to @SusieleeNV @StevenHorsford and @DinaTitus on their re-elections!   I look forward to continuing to work alongside them in Congress to move Nevada forward!

So many Nevadans – & Americans – worked tirelessly to make this outcome a reality.   I'm so thrilled to call @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris our next President & Vice President!   Together we'll work every day to build back better from this pandemic & restore the soul of our nation. https://t.co/aESDuxc24Z
If you were in line by 8pm at one of these polling locations you are eligible to cast your ballot.   Please stay in line! https://t.co/x6pD5H9NS1

Nevadans: most polling locations close at 7pm and if you were in line by 7pm you are eligible to cast your ballot.   Some Clark County locations are remaining open until 8pm.   Please stay in line to make your voice heard! 🗳 https://t.co/x6pD5H9NS1
🚨 You still have time to get in line to vote!   Make sure you have all the information you need to cast your ballot:   https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV
Nevadans are voting all across our state today!   Have you voted yet?   Make a plan to vote before polls close at 7pm: https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV https://t.co/QmwKcUErwD

Nevada – it's Election Day!   Polls are open from 7am-7pm.   So much is at stake in this election.   We must elect @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris.   Get all the information you need to safely cast your ballot today: https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV https://t.co/4Osv1Xyhl2

There is no excuse for employing anti-Semitic tropes against Jewish candidates.   This year we have seen anti-Semitism rear its ugly head in political campaigns far too often.   Our nation is better than this. https://t.co/ZdbWFdUncD
Great to help launch a @NVDems canvass today with @SusieLeeNV and @ZConine!   Nevadans are fired up to elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris tomorrow! https://t.co/ajz4a7gqSU
Today at 12pm @SusieLeeNV @ZConine and I are launching a @NVDems canvass in Henderson!  Sign up to join us and help keep Nevada blue:  https://t.co/yXJOL295q6
Tomorrow I'm joining @SusieLeeNV and @ZConine to launch a @NVDems canvass!   Sign up to join us:  https://t.co/G0zbn4PZjZ
.@JoeBiden stands with us in the fight against rising anti-Semitism.   We must all work together to root out hate and bigotry in our communities.   https://t.co/Q8TvafRbXO
Join me along with my friends @SusieLeeNV and @ZConine at a Henderson canvass launch for @NVDems on Monday!   With your help we'll keep Nevada blue next week:  https://t.co/G0zbn4PZjZ

👻🎃 Happy Halloween Nevada!  You know what's scary?   If we don't elect @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris and Democrats all the way down the ballot we won't be able to protect and expand the Affordable Care Act.   Let's turn out on Tuesday and get this done.

I had the chance to call Karianna and her mom this week.   At just 6 years old she's already full of passion and ambition.   Karianna if you ever decide to run for Senate give me a call! https://t.co/xMDJBkpPuM

🚨 TODAY is the final day of early voting in Nevada.   We need to elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris to help us build back better from this pandemic.   Go to https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV to check your registration and find an early voting location near you.

From attempting to end DACA to family separation this Administration's immigration policies have been entirely opposed to our American values.   We can't give them the chance to enact 4 more years of cruel policies – we have to elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris on Tuesday. https://t.co/ei5f4rIaSi
Nevada! It's the LAST DAY to vote early.   Make your plan to vote today at: https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV

TOMORROW is the final day of in-person early voting in Nevada.   Have you cast your early vote ballot yet?   Watch @JimmyKimmel's message for us then go to https://t.co/Hh4wPXSiKZ to make a plan to vote early with @NVDems. https://t.co/WxuyktD8Js
The last day to vote early is TOMORROW.   Make your plan to vote early right now at: https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV https://t.co/AMUseoC3Yb

With less than a week to go until Election Day this is deeply concerning.   If you can drop off your ballot in-person.   Click here for county-specific information on dropping off your ballot: https://t.co/MftVvpIfyu https://t.co/ovj1xDoz6d
TOMORROW is the final day to early vote in Nevada.   Have you made your voice heard yet?   Get all the information you need to cast your ballot at https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV https://t.co/jOWWZ9Gz6p
Have you voted yet?   Early voting in Nevada is happening now and runs through Friday October 30th!   Make your plan to vote early: https://t.co/KbOUmCCX9B

There is less than a week to Election Day and we have to #FlipTheSenate to be able to enact the meaningful change hardworking families need.   Pick a race to support in this final stretch:   https://t.co/afYJS44zFJ

It was so exciting to help welcome my friend and our next Vice President @KamalaHarris to Las Vegas!   The stakes of this election couldn't be higher.   Early voting is underway NOW through Friday October 30th.   Make your plan to vote at: https://t.co/Hh4wPXSiKZ https://t.co/pr1qTnBDu6
Nevada: I want to remind you to make a plan to vote!   Early voting in Nevada is underway right now.   Make a plan with @NVDems to vote early at: https://t.co/Hh4wPXSiKZ https://t.co/wF4xGDKjUp

With less than 1 week of in-person early voting remaining in Nevada listen to @JimmyKimmel – make a plan to vote early right now with @NVDems at https://t.co/Hh4wPXSiKZ and urge your family friends and neighbors to do the same. https://t.co/0KpvGTiJtQ

As my friend @JoeBiden says the soul of our nation is at stake in this election.   Early voting is available in Nevada through October 30th.   Get the information you need at https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV to make your voice heard! https://t.co/3KGWpjYN0F
TODAY: join Connie Chung and me at 12pm PT/3pm ET as we discuss the stakes of this election and impact it will have on our AAPI community.   I hope to see you there: https://t.co/698AwSqGBG

In the final presidential debate we once again heard the positive bold vision @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris have to build all of our communities back better from this pandemic.   I'm proud to support Joe and Kamala and I can't wait to elect them in 12 days.   Let's get to work.

We saw @JoeBiden's empathy and how much he cares about Nevadans when he visited Las Vegas in 2018.   In tonight's debate I know we'll see that same empathy for the American people.   Like Joe says the soul of our nation is at stake in this election. https://t.co/h5VePuAcQr

Tomorrow Connie Chung and I are having a conversation about how high the stakes of this election are and how critical it is that our AAPI community make their voices heard on November 3rd.   Sign up to join us: https://t.co/698AwSqGBG

Hey Nevada! @JimmyKimmel has a message for us: we need to VOTE.   We have the power to change the course of the nation with our vote.   In-person early voting is underway right now and runs through October 30th.   Go to https://t.co/Hh4wPXSiKZ to make a plan to vote with @NVDems. https://t.co/cC0V0zGLyX

What a special event tonight with @HamiltonMusical’s @PhillipaSoo @LacketyLac and Thomas Kail!   Don’t throw away your shot to vote this year — make a plan at: https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV https://t.co/DqwuARkM4F

In ONE HOUR I'll be getting together with @PhillipaSoo @LacketyLac and the Director of Hamilton Thomas Kail!   We'll be discussing the importance of voting this year – the stakes couldn't be higher.   I hope to see you there: https://t.co/HK5sKfHRMy https://t.co/WuwH6Kgnr5

Connie Chung spent decades as a journalist covering American politics. She knows how much is at stake in this election.   On Friday we're having a conversation on how important it is that our AAPI community – & all communities – make their voices heard.   https://t.co/URC4FJV27p

If you know me you know I love @HamiltonMusical.   That's why I couldn't be more excited to join @PhillipaSoo @LacketyLac and the Director of Hamilton Thomas Kail TONIGHT!   Sign up to join us at 8pm ET/5pm PT: https://t.co/8n0IeLYROQ https://t.co/Vyxzlgo4vN

Raise a glass to freedom with @PhillipaSoo @LacketyLac the Director of @HamiltonMusical Thomas Kail and me!   Tomorrow we're getting together to discuss the stakes of this election and how important it is to get out and VOTE.   Sign up now: https://t.co/hL85vywxbc https://t.co/FhrZayV1Ir

Tomorrow I'm joining @Phillipasoo and the Director of @HamiltonMusical Thomas Kail to discuss everything that's at stake in this election and how important it is that we get out and vote.   Don't throw away your shot – sign up to join us:  https://t.co/8n0IeLYROQ https://t.co/tTijjDLxX7

Nevada don't throw away your shot to vote this year!   I can't wait to join @Phillipasoo and the Director of @HamiltonMusical Thomas Kail on Wednesday to discuss all that's at stake in this election.   Join us: https://t.co/8n0IeLYROQ

History has its eyes on us and the stakes of this election couldn't be higher.   On Wednesday I'm discussing how important it is to vote this year with Phillipa Soo and the Director of @HamiltonMusical Thomas Kail!   Sign up to join us:   https://t.co/N4r7cSH8rI

Yesterday I cast my ballot!   Voting early was quick and easy.   Early voting runs through October 30th.   Make your plan to vote early by mail or on Election Day by visiting: https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV https://t.co/3kHYVKaiOa

I just voted early!   Proud to stand alongside my friend and colleague @CatherineforNV to cast my ballot for @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris and Democrats up and down the ticket.   Make your plan to vote at: https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV https://t.co/FzXYBAEQRP
I can't wait to cast my ballot tomorrow alongside @CatherineforNV!   Sign up to join us at the East Las Vegas Community Center:   https://t.co/Q0evjU516n

Today's the day!   Early voting has begun in Nevada and runs through October 30th.   Go to https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV to check your registration and find an early voting location near you. https://t.co/Ayei1vAufK
On Sunday @CatherineforNV and I are going to vote early at the East Las Vegas Community Center!   Sign up here to join us:   https://t.co/Rgk68yBPOI

Great to join the @TeamJoe "Soul of Our Nation" bus tour for their Las Vegas stop!   We need to elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris in 18 days to restore the soul of our nation and build back better from this pandemic.   Let's do this Nevada. https://t.co/Sdru8Gen0R

Nevada: early voting begins TOMORROW and runs through October 30th.   The stakes of this election have never been higher.   Go to https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV today to make sure you have all the information you need to cast your ballot. https://t.co/iiFCk11cS1
There's still time to sign up to join @IJasonAlexander and me for today's event to discuss the importance of early voting this year!   https://t.co/xq1uyYZMCc
Don't miss a special event this Friday to share how important it is to #FlipTheSenate in November hosted by my friends @CatherineforNV and @BarackObama! ⬇️  https://t.co/4cNBidTp3o
Excited to join @IJasonAlexander for a conversation on the importance of early voting with @NVDems on Thursday!   I hope to see you there – sign up here:  https://t.co/xq1uyYZMCc

At today's Las Vegas rally @JoeBiden made it clear how critical it is to make your voice heard and vote in this election.   Go to https://t.co/xKA4jE1giV to make sure you have all the information you need to cast your ballot!
It was great to help welcome @JoeBiden to Las Vegas today!   The stakes of this election couldn't be higher.   We need to elect Joe Biden and Kamala Harris. https://t.co/sYyKQebaTV
It's my pleasure to be with @JoeBiden at today's Las Vegas rally to make sure Nevadans know how important it is to get out and vote in this election!   Tune in:  https://t.co/NX6j1qU4K6

Like last week's debate we again heard two vastly different visions for the future of our country.   We need to elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris – they'll be ready on day one to build back better from this pandemic and help all of our communities succeed.
Las Vegas is rooting for @KamalaHarris tonight! https://t.co/6X9MOOYRk9

I'm joining a debate watch party with leaders in Nevada's Latino community to cheer on @KamalaHarris!   As she takes the stage we must remember the stakes of this election – affordable health care access voting rights protecting our immigrant communities and much more.
I’m looking forward to cheering on my friend and colleague @KamalaHarris in tonight’s Vice Presidential debate! https://t.co/6iLJc88zuZ

HOY: acompáñenos en un evento virtual de los @NVDems con @CatherineforNV @TomPerez @TigresDelNorte y más para hablar sobre lo importante que es que nuestra comunidad latina haga escuchar su voz en la elección presidencial.   Registrarse aquí:  https://t.co/ZAaH29Mdt9

TODAY: join a special @NVDems virtual event with @CatherineforNV @TomPerez @TigresDelNorte and more to discuss how important it is that our Latino community make their voices heard in this election.   Register here:  https://t.co/ZAaH29Mdt9

We have just over a month to elect @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris.   They'll fight every day for ALL Nevadans including our AAPI community.   Watch my friend Connie Chung share why she's supporting them then get involved: https://t.co/RUgMDee5Zn  https://t.co/wOCObyoESp

When asked to condemn white supremacy President Trump could not even say the words.   His failure to condemn it is appalling.   Bigotry and hate have no place in our communities. https://t.co/CNUebQvnn4
Tonight we heard two very different visions for our country.   It couldn't be clearer: @JoeBiden is the President we need to lead us through this moment and build back better.

I'll be cheering on @JoeBiden during tonight's debate!   Access to affordable health care and the chance to build back better from this pandemic are at stake.   We need Joe Biden and Kamala Harris in the White House.

The President has been paying less in income taxes than hardworking families all across Nevada and spent years avoiding paying his fair share.   He's not putting Nevada's families first – we need to elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris.  https://t.co/f2Qgyi54sh
The stakes of this election are so high.   Access to health care voting rights the future of the Supreme Court and more are all on the line.   We must elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris.

Again and again the President has questioned the loyalty and patriotism of American Jews.   With anti-Semitism at an all-time high in the US remarks like this have no place in our discourse and must be condemned.   https://t.co/1lGt0xscun
It was my pleasure to join @USJewishDems for their Nevada launch!   The path to winning this election goes straight through Nevada – we must keep Nevada blue.
Join @APIAVote in celebrating #NationalVoterRegistrationDay today to ensure that #AAPIvoices are heard in this election. ⬇️  https://t.co/anVfpV7o8D
It's empowering to register to vote and make your voice heard.  Celebrate #NationalVoterRegistrationDay by sharing your voter registration story with @NVDems! https://t.co/1l1IFybi8m

Nevadans: celebrate #NationalVoterRegistrationDay by making sure you're registered at your current address and have all the information you need to vote in November.   It's never been more important to make your voice heard.  https://t.co/ZeQ9hpDRjw
Over 200000 Americans are dead and families across the country are hurting.   The President's rhetoric isn't just false it's offensive. https://t.co/WgwaF3akZv

The President is perpetuating the anti-Semitic trope of Jewish American dual loyalty.   It’s not the first time he has made remarks like this.   American Jews are Americans.   This is our country. https://t.co/ZtDxgY1Xcd

Great to see our next Vice President @KamalaHarris visit Las Vegas and spend time hearing from Latino leaders!   Our Latino community has been hit disproportionately hard by #COVID19 and we need to work together to build back better.  https://t.co/grVPNQPcvo

Los rincones más oscuros del Internet están difundiendo mensajes antisemitas y teorías de conspiración entre los votantes latinos en Florida. A medida que nos acercamos a las elecciones debemos estar mejor preparados en la lucha contra el odio en línea.   https://t.co/nXi2Y0pIgJ

The darkest corners of the internet are spreading vile anti-Semitic tropes and conspiracy theories to Latino voters in Florida.   As we approach the 2020 election Americans must be especially vigilant in combatting online hate.  https://t.co/nXi2Y0pIgJ

50 days to Election Day.  All weekend President Trump pushed dangerous rhetoric while putting Nevadans’ public health at risk by violating state & local safety directives.  We have to elect @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris.   Get the info you need to vote at https://t.co/Hh4wPXSiKZ https://t.co/uBagVbUp4Z

The President knew how deadly COVID-19 was back in February and yet played down the threat.   Since then we’ve lost almost 200000 Americans to this cruel virus: mothers fathers brothers sisters friends.   The President endangered the American people and we deserve better. https://t.co/OXrjmQ6CMc
It’s now or never!   Join @swingleft to volunteer on #TheLastWeekends before Election Day – we need you.   https://t.co/guRspCHkfa https://t.co/wJnVfXgukv
Our servicemembers who made the ultimate sacrifice for our nation are heroes and patriots who deserve nothing less than our utmost respect.   https://t.co/V0t5kkqL1t
When so much was at stake in 2018 @JoeBiden showed up for us.   This year we've got to show up for him and make sure he's the next President of the United States. https://t.co/TxlSpNAU81
Joe Biden and Kamala Harris understand the threat of anti-Semitism – and will lead a comprehensive approach to reverse the rising wave of bigotry and hate. https://t.co/XTHDprqiLd

In 2018 @KamalaHarris reminded Nevadans how important it is to vote.   This year it's even more critical that we make our voices heard.   Get involved at https://t.co/q31wicd0EW https://t.co/gaEuEXkx01

All week we heard divisiveness and extreme partisanship at the RNC convention.   It's never been more clear: we must elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris to restore the soul of our nation and build our communities back better from this challenging time.

Together with Nevada’s women leaders I’m calling out President Trump for his efforts to strike down the ACA mishandling #COVID19 and handing out corporate tax breaks.   He's failed America's women and we deserve better leadership.   That leader is @JoeBiden. https://t.co/xaiAa97CYz
I’m proud to support @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris.   Their Administration will strengthen the US-Israel relationship. https://t.co/aMsDtQf3aZ

This week is showing us how critical it is that we elect Democrats up & down the ballot. We have to elect @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris but we also must take back the Senate & remove Mitch McConnell from leadership.  Pick a state & help us flip the Senate ⬇️  https://t.co/afYJS44zFJ

As we celebrate #WomensEqualityDay let’s commit to make a plan to vote for @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris.   Joe and Kamala will fight every day to ensure we get closer to full equality for women.   Text VOTE to 30330 now. https://t.co/FdsIhYpBeh

The pandemic poses unique challenges to voting access.   Thank you @GovSisolak for standing firm for Nevadans and ensuring all eligible voters will have the ability to make their voices heard this November.   https://t.co/aXAUSJfcUP

We're facing a lot of challenges as a nation from the #COVID19 pandemic to the fight for racial justice.  Instead of offering positive solutions all we've heard at the RNC convention this week has been division & extreme partisanship.  We have to elect @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris

At the RNC convention today we didn't hear positive solutions to overcome the challenges we're facing. @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris are running to unite the country around an agenda of meaningful change. Join us in the fight to beat Trump & keep Nevada Blue: https://t.co/pbxeIXzwe9

What an exciting night to see @JoeBiden accept the nomination for President of the United States!  VP Biden has dedicated his life to public service & he’ll build our communities back better from this pandemic.   I’m ready to elect him and @KamalaHarris – let’s get to work.

Tonight we witnessed history as my friend @KamalaHarris officially accepted the nomination to be our next Vice President – I couldn’t be more thrilled!   I’m fired up to do everything I can to elect her & @JoeBiden on November 3rd.

Join Actor @wongbd Lt. Gov @KateMarshallNV @Senatorspearman and me for the Nevada Pre-Show today at 5:15pm as we kick-off Day 3 of the @DemConvention! Join us by registering below -- you won't want to miss this!  https://t.co/RakBRceMwr

.@YvannaCancela is one of our Party’s rising stars and I’m proud that the rest of the country got to see her trailblazing leadership at tonight’s #DemConvention!  Her work will help us elect @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris and build Nevada back better. https://t.co/c6JAaL4GG2

No issue threatens the Jewish community more than the alarming rise of anti-Semitism. At today's Jewish American Community Meeting at the #DNCConvention I spoke about how @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris will bring real meaningful action in the fight against hate. https://t.co/Wts1chh93Q

I had a great time joining the #DNCConvention Seniors Council meeting today. America has always promised that each life is endowed with the same promise of living & aging with dignity and respect. I know a @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris Admin will fight for our seniors at all costs.

So proud to see my friend @CatherineForNV speak at the @DemConvention tonight!   She is an incredible leader for Nevada and our country.   I couldn’t be more honored to fight alongside her in the Senate. https://t.co/XZfuXT4T2B

Kamala Harris is a fierce fighter for progressive values.   As her colleague in the Senate I’ve seen her tireless advocacy up close.   She’ll be a fantastic Vice President and I look forward to casting my ballot for Joe Biden & Kamala Harris. https://t.co/4wFDdMYnEH

We won’t let partisan attempts to suppress Nevadans’ vote succeed.   I stand with those in our state legislature working tirelessly to expand access to the ballot box and ensure all eligible Nevadans can vote safely amid this pandemic. https://t.co/BU4dhT3HoD

Using vile anti-Semitic tropes to attack @Ossoff fans the flames of bigotry.   With anti-Semitism at an all-time high in the US we must work to combat this scourge whenever we see it.   There is no place for hate in our communities or our politics. https://t.co/kqgTfcJa36

.@JoeBiden knows that every issue is a women's issue and that women are disproportionately impacted by many policies.   I'm proud to support Vice President Biden's new Women's Agenda!   Read the full plan >>>  https://t.co/bYwuGASSzB

Thank you to everyone who worked so hard in the final 100 days in 2018 to turn Nevada blue.   This year we've got to keep Nevada blue by electing @JoeBiden as well as Democrats up and down the ballot.   Go to https://t.co/q31wicd0EW to get involved! https://t.co/NkY8Mnfth6

.@NVDems are putting together an incredible team and I know with their hard work we'll keep Nevada blue in November.   Great to join my friend @CatherineForNV in welcoming the newest members of their team! https://t.co/vz2aK2m7eq

I enjoyed this week's discussion with @JulianCastro and Tracey Richards a home health care worker from Las Vegas on @JoeBiden's bold plan to #BuildBackBetter from this challenging time with a strong caregiver & education workforce. https://t.co/2viWkY1PMN

Thanks to @WashoeDems for having me this week – nothing better than speaking with a group of fired up Democrats!   Together we’ll keep Nevada blue this fall.   Volunteer with @NVDems and join us: https://t.co/SkMeMhTFJD https://t.co/9DRL6e0Npc
Great to join the Siena Progressive Club and @RedRockDems today for a virtual meeting.   We’re fired up and ready to keep Nevada blue in November! ⬇️  https://t.co/SkMeMhTFJD https://t.co/bzIDtIbXQT

#COVID19 isn’t a partisan issue.  Thank you @DeanHeller Governor Sandoval and @Hutch4Nevada for reminding Nevadans of these simple important steps we must take to overcome this pandemic.  https://t.co/KuXaXWsRoe

Just days after President Trump amplified a white power video through his social media it is unconscionable that his campaign is selling merchandise using a logo that is disturbingly similar to a Nazi symbol that represents one of the darkest moments in human history.
.@YvannaCancela @AlanaMounce and @ShelbyWiltz are among the best Democratic talent Nevada has to offer.   I have no doubt we’ll keep Nevada blue because of their hard work!  https://t.co/mHi3LSRg5I

.@Nicole4Nevada is an incredible Nevada trailblazer.   I'm thrilled she was selected as a finalist for this year's @EmilysList Gabrielle Giffords Rising Star Award!   Voting is open – vote for Nicole today!   https://t.co/JL0XvvZl71
Fantastic to speak at the @NVDems’ virtual state convention!   This year we’ll keep Nevada blue because of the tireless work of each and every one of you. https://t.co/tLAzmcL1cK
Today’s the day Nevada – get out and vote!   Questions or issues about voting in today’s primary?   Call the @NVDems Voter Protection Hotline at 888-525-VOTE (8683). https://t.co/codEnRGZLM

Everything is on the line this November.   We need a Democratic majority in the Senate to defend the ACA protect immigrant families combat climate change and so much more.   Join the @DSCC and help us #FlipTheSenate ⬇️  https://t.co/WtKArdIZ4d
#TeamRosen joined thousands in Las Vegas last night in support of our community.   It’s long past due to take action and create change for the better. #BlackLivesMatter https://t.co/1HScp4zpeC

I’m honored to serve alongside @CatherineforNV.  She is a force who has made fighting for Nevada her life’s work.   I’m proud to be her partner in the Senate as we fight for Nevada’s hardworking families to overcome #COVID19 and beyond.

Very saddened to hear of the loss of Dr. @RobertEFowlerSr Senior Pastor at Las Vegas's Victory Baptist Church.   He will be missed by southern Nevada's faith community.   My heart is with his family friends and congregation during this time. https://t.co/UrACTgfYh1

As a proud Nevadan I cannot think of anyone better than our state’s very own @CatherineForNV to become the first female vice president of the United States of America. #NevadaProud   https://t.co/EUBZnTpx7X
My statement on protecting Nevadans’ right to vote ⤵️ https://t.co/e9gU8OwT5X
I look forward to working with our party to make sure Nevada plays a critical and early role in our next nominating process and that includes moving from a caucus to a primary.

Nevada takes great pride in working hard to ensure that we are making it easier for people to participate in our democracy.   I applaud the @nvdems for making the process more accessible this year by adding early vote and same day voter registration.
This year’s #FirstInTheWest caucus was a huge success and showcased why Nevada has earned a right to play a leading role in the Democratic presidential nominating process.
Thank you to every Nevada Democrat coming out to make their voice heard today.   Fantastic to see so many fired up caucus-goers! https://t.co/oQbIgSbZl0
